dict.acceptation: 行为；态度；（机器等的）运转状态；（事物的）反应；

sent.orig: Behavior characters distinguish it from administrative correlation behavior and specific administrative behavior behavior.
sent.trans: 在行为性质上区别于行政相关行为和具体行政行为。

sent.orig: Behavior Modification: Behavior modification uses reinforcement theory to change human behavior.
sent.trans: 行为矫正：行为矫正使用强化理论改变人类行为。

sent.orig: The army behavior (AB) is the core part in the national behavior and defense behavior.
sent.trans: 军队行为是国家行为及国防行为中的核心部分。

sent.orig: There is a sort of ashy behavior between lawful behavior and offence behavior.
sent.trans: 在合法行为与违法行为之外，还存在着一种灰色行为。

sent.orig: It mainly contains three elements: individual behavior, group behavior and organizational behavior.
sent.trans: 其主要内容有三大块：个体行为、群体行为和组织行为。
